ipv4Block_description: IPv4 address block. The available block sizes will vary depending on the associated service.
ipv4Block_organization_description1: You must link an organisation to your IP address block. The organisation represents the administrative entity holding the IP address block, and must be declared in the public WHOIS database (global registry of IP addresses and domain names). The organisation contains the following contact information: name, RIR type, and email address.
ipv4Block_organization_description3: If you do not link an organisation, your OVHcloud account information (NIC handle) can be used
ipv4Block_organization_info_banner: The organisation name linked to your IP address block will appear in the public WHOIS database, along with the corresponding contact information.
ip_agora_description: In many cases, you may need either a standard IPv4 or the latest IPv6 protocol. Please note that the list of compatible products may vary.
ip_agora_ipv4_description: Internet standard (from today). It is the most widely used addressing protocol on the Internet, and thus the most commonly supported.
ip_agora_ipv6_description: IPv6 is the most suitable option when large IP blocks are required and a hierarchical addressing scheme is in place. Make sure all your customers have access to the new protocol as well as your services
ip_agora_ipv6_option_header: In many cases, you may need either a standard IPv4 (the most commonly used) or the latest IPv6 protocol. Please note that the list of compatible products may vary.
ip_agora_ipv6_option_tile_description: Get your new IPv6 prefix to use in vRack services.
ipv6-per-region_limit_reached_error: You have reached the maximum limit of 3 additional IPv6 blocks in the selected region. Please select another region
ipv6_limit_reached_error: You have reached the maximum limit of additional IPv6 blocks
ip_agora_like_this_tooltip: Like this page? Send us your feedback!
ip_agora_ip_localisation_description: Please select one of the locations available for your new additional {{ ipType }} address block.
ip_region_us-east-vin: North America (United States – East – Vint Hill)
ip_agora_table_header_region: Select a region for your new Additional IP
ip_agora_ipv4_localisation_description: To change the geolocation of your IP address, please select country in the drop-down list.
